data.system_settings: iPhone 6s Plus on iOS 10.2.1, App Store app version 1.8.1 .
data.actual_result: The app glitches, shows whitespace underneath text when navigating, and various other UI features misbehave.
data.short_description: App shows whitespace and glitches during usage with extended menubar
data.steps_to_repro: - Get an extended bar, easiest way to make this happen is to enable personal hotspot and connect a device, or go on a call. - Open the app, once the extended menubar is visible. - Navigate the app, especially swiping motions, keyboard up/down and user selection.
